tool_description: The "Generate YouTube Video Summary" API tool is an innovative solution designed to streamline and enhance the process of summarizing YouTube videos effortlessly. This tool empowers developers, content creators, and businesses to extract concise, informative summaries from lengthy YouTube videos, facilitating efficient content consumption and knowledge sharing.
name: Generate YouTube Video Summary
title: Generate YouTube Video Summary

api_list.name: Get YouTube Summary
api_list.description:
The "/youtube_summary" endpoint is a powerful feature within the "Generate YouTube Video Summary" API tool, offering developers a direct and efficient method to integrate video summarization capabilities into their applications, platforms, or services.

Example:
/youtube_summary?youtube_url=https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=DjjIZnM3jGo
